Class BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • BBjGridExWidgetColumnDefinition
      • BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnDefinition
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BBjGridExWidgetAutoGroupColumn, BBjGridExWidgetColumn

    public class BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnDefinition
extends BBjGridExWidgetColumnDefinition
    The class reprensets the default column defintion which the grid will use.
    Author:
    Hyyan Abo Fakher

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      BBjString AggFunc!
      Name of function to use for aggregation.
      java.util.HashSet AllowedAggFuncs!
      Aggregation functions allowed on this column eg ['sum', 'avg'].
      BBjNumber AutoHeight!
      Set to true to have the grid calculate height of row based on contents of this column.
      java.util.ArrayList CellClass!
      CSS class(s) to use for the cell.
      JsonObject CellClassRules!
      Rules which can be applied to include certain CSS classes.
      BBjGridExWidgetCellEditorInterface CellEditor!
      CellEditor to use for this column

      A cellRenderer to use for this column
      JsonObject CellStyle!
      A map of css values.
      BBjNumber CheckboxSelection!
      Set to true to render a selection checkbox in the column.
      BBjString DefaultDatesMask!
      The default dates mask to use.
      BBjString DefaultNumbersMask!
      The default numbers mask to use.
      BBjString DefaultTimestampsMask!
      The default timestamps mask to use.
      BBjNumber Editable!
      Set to true if the column is editable, otherwise false.
      BBjNumber EnableFilter!
      When true the filter is enabled , disabled otherwise
      BBjNumber EnablePivot!
      (ag-Grid-Enterprise only) Set to true if you want to be able to pivot by this column via the UI.
      BBjNumber EnableRowGroup!
      (ag-Grid-Enterprise only) Set to true if you want to be able to row group by this column via the UI.
      BBjNumber EnableValue!
      (ag-Grid-Enterprise only) Set to true if you want to be able to aggregate by this column via the UI.
      BBjGridExWidgetFilterInterface Filter!
      The filter component to use for this column
      BBjGridExWidgetExpressionInterface FilterValueGetterExpression!
      An Ag Grid expresion which can be executed to get the value for filtering purposes.
      BBjNumber HeaderCheckboxSelection!
      Set to true to render a selection checkbox in the column's header.
      BBjString HeaderTooltip!
      Tooltip for the column header
      BBjNumber Hidden!
      Set to true to make a column hidden by default.
      BBjNumber LockPinned!
      Set to true block pinning column via the UI (API will still work).
      BBjNumber LockPosition!
      Set to true to always have column displayed first.
      BBjNumber LockVisible!
      Set to true block making column visible / hidden via the UI (API will still work).
      BBjNumber MaxWidth!
      Initial max width in pixels
      BBjNumber MinWidth!
      Initial min width in pixels
      BBjString Pinned!
      Set to 'left' or 'right' to pin.
      BBjNumber PivotIndex!
      Set this in columns you want to pivot by.
      BBjNumber Resizable!
      Set to true to allow column to be resized.
      BBjNumber RowGroupIndex!
      Set this in columns you want to group by.
      BBjString Sort!
      Set to 'asc' or 'desc' to sort by this column by default.
      BBjNumber Sortable!
      Set to true to allow sorting on this column.
      BBjNumber SuppressMenu!
      Set to true if no menu should be shown for this column header.
      BBjNumber SuppressMovable!
      Set to true if you do not want this column to be movable via dragging.
      BBjNumber SuppressNavigable!
      Set to true if this col is not navigable (ie cannot be tabbed into), otherwise false.
      BBjNumber SuppressSizeToFit!
      Set to true if you want this columns width to be fixed during 'size to fit' operation.
      BBjNumber Type!
      The Field Type.
      BBjNumber UnSortIcon!
      Set to true if you want the unsorted icon to be shown when no sort is applied to this column.
      BBjGridExWidgetExpressionInterface ValueFormatterExpression!
      An Ag Grid expresion which can be executed to format the value for display.
      BBjGridExWidgetExpressionInterface ValueGetterExpression!
      An Ag Grid expresion which can be executed before getting the value from your data for display
      BBjGridExWidgetExpressionInterface ValueParserExpression!
      An Ag Grid expresion which can be executed to parse the value for saving.
      BBjGridExWidgetExpressionInterface ValueSetterExpression!
      An Ag Grid expresion which can be executed before setting the value into your data for saving.
      BBjNumber Width!
      Initial width in pixels Note: setting the width to zero will not hide the column , use setHidden() instead.

    • Field Detail

      • Type!

        public BBjNumber Type!
        The Field Type. Note : Not all sql types are supported , for example it does not make sense to declare a colum type as STRUCT.
        See Also:
        https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/java/sql/Types.html

      • Width!

        public BBjNumber Width!
        Initial width in pixels Note: setting the width to zero will not hide the column , use setHidden() instead. And if the width is null() this means the grid will auto set the width for this column
        See Also:
        setHidden()

      • AggFunc!

        public BBjString AggFunc!
        Name of function to use for aggregation. One of [sum, min, max, first, last].

      • AllowedAggFuncs!

        public java.util.HashSet AllowedAggFuncs!
        Aggregation functions allowed on this column eg ['sum', 'avg'].

      • RowGroupIndex!

        public BBjNumber RowGroupIndex!
        Set this in columns you want to group by. If only grouping by one column, set this to any number (eg 0). If grouping by multiple columns, set this to where you want this column to be in the group (eg 0 for first, 1 for second, and so on).

      • PivotIndex!

        public BBjNumber PivotIndex!
        Set this in columns you want to pivot by. If only pivoting by one column, set this to any number (eg 0). If pivoting by multiple columns, set this to where you want this column to be in the order of pivots (eg 0 for first, 1 for second, and so on).

      • UnSortIcon!

        public BBjNumber UnSortIcon!
        Set to true if you want the unsorted icon to be shown when no sort is applied to this column.

      • EnableRowGroup!

        public BBjNumber EnableRowGroup!
        (ag-Grid-Enterprise only) Set to true if you want to be able to row group by this column via the UI.

      • EnablePivot!

        public BBjNumber EnablePivot!
        (ag-Grid-Enterprise only) Set to true if you want to be able to pivot by this column via the UI.

      • EnableValue!

        public BBjNumber EnableValue!
        (ag-Grid-Enterprise only) Set to true if you want to be able to aggregate by this column via the UI.

      • SuppressMenu!

        public BBjNumber SuppressMenu!
        Set to true if no menu should be shown for this column header.

      • SuppressSizeToFit!

        public BBjNumber SuppressSizeToFit!
        Set to true if you want this columns width to be fixed during 'size to fit' operation.

      • SuppressMovable!

        public BBjNumber SuppressMovable!
        Set to true if you do not want this column to be movable via dragging.

      • SuppressNavigable!

        public BBjNumber SuppressNavigable!
        Set to true if this col is not navigable (ie cannot be tabbed into), otherwise false.

      • AutoHeight!

        public BBjNumber AutoHeight!
        Set to true to have the grid calculate height of row based on contents of this column.

      • CellClassRules!

        public JsonObject CellClassRules!
        Rules which can be applied to include certain CSS classes. These rules are provided as a map where the keys are the class names and the values are expressions that if evaluated to true, the class gets used. Inside the condition you can use serveral predefined params, some of these params are : 1. x = > maps value 2. ctx = > maps the grid context 3. data = > maps the current data row 4. rowIndex = > maps the current row index
        See Also:
        https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-grid-cell-styles/#cell-style-cell-class-cell-class-rules-params

      • ValueGetterExpression!

        public BBjGridExWidgetExpressionInterface ValueGetterExpression!
        An Ag Grid expresion which can be executed before getting the value from your data for display
        See Also:
        https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-grid-cell-expressions/

      • ValueFormatterExpression!

        public BBjGridExWidgetExpressionInterface ValueFormatterExpression!
        An Ag Grid expresion which can be executed to format the value for display.
        See Also:
        https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-grid-cell-expressions/

      • FilterValueGetterExpression!

        public BBjGridExWidgetExpressionInterface FilterValueGetterExpression!
        An Ag Grid expresion which can be executed to get the value for filtering purposes.
        See Also:
        https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-grid-cell-expressions/

      • ValueSetterExpression!

        public BBjGridExWidgetExpressionInterface ValueSetterExpression!
        An Ag Grid expresion which can be executed before setting the value into your data for saving.
        See Also:
        https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-grid-cell-expressions/

      • ValueParserExpression!

        public BBjGridExWidgetExpressionInterface ValueParserExpression!
        An Ag Grid expresion which can be executed to parse the value for saving.
        See Also:
        https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-grid-cell-expressions/

      • DefaultNumbersMask!

        public BBjString DefaultNumbersMask!
        The default numbers mask to use. by default null()

      • DefaultDatesMask!

        public BBjString DefaultDatesMask!
        The default dates mask to use. by default %Dz.%Mz.%Yd

      • DefaultTimestampsMask!

        public BBjString DefaultTimestampsMask!
        The default timestamps mask to use. by defualt %Dz.%Mz.%Yl %Hz:%mz:%sz

      • setColumnMask

        public void setColumnMask(BBjString mask!)
        Set the mask of a column using value formatter expression. Note: This method will override the ValueFormatterExpression of the column.The method depends on the column type to determine the correct value formatter (number , date , ...)
        Parameters:
        BBjString - mask!: The (date or numeric) mask, BBj style

      • setType

        public void setType(BBjNumber type!)
        Set the column type
        Parameters:
        BBjString - type! SQL type Note : Not all sql types are supported , for example it does not make sense to declare a colum type as STRUCT. Setting the type will change the column common properites automatically like the filter , cell editor , ....
        See Also:
        https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/java/sql/Types.html
